trans-unit.source: You have a special talent with machines of all kinds, and you’re adept at understanding and, if need be, repairing them. Perhaps you’re a bit of an inventor, creating new machines from time to time. You get called “techie,” “tech,” “mech,” “gear-head,” “motor-head,” or any of a number of other nicknames. Mechanics usually wear practical work clothes and carry around a lot of tools.
trans-unit.target: You have a special talent with machines of all kinds, and you’re adept at understanding and, if need be, repairing them. Perhaps you’re a bit of an inventor, creating new machines from time to time. You get called “techie,” “tech,” “mech,” “gear-head,” “motor-head,” or any of a number of other nicknames. Mechanics usually wear practical work clothes and carry around a lot of tools.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all actions involving identifying or understanding machines.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all actions involving identifying or understanding machines.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all actions involving using, repairing, or crafting machines.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all actions involving using, repairing, or crafting machines.

trans-unit.source: Additional Equipment: You start with a variety of machine tools.
trans-unit.target: Additional Equipment: You start with a variety of machine tools.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: While repairing a nearby machine, you overheard the other PCs talking.
trans-unit.target: While repairing a nearby machine, you overheard the other PCs talking.

trans-unit.source: You need money to buy tools and parts.
trans-unit.target: You need money to buy tools and parts.

trans-unit.source: It was clear that the mission couldn’t succeed without your skills and knowledge.
trans-unit.target: It was clear that the mission couldn’t succeed without your skills and knowledge.

trans-unit.source: Another PC asked you to join them.
trans-unit.target: Another PC asked you to join them.
